meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of anagoge.
meanings.sent1: The anagogic meaning of the story revealed a deeper spiritual truth.
meanings.sent2: Her anagogic interpretation of the poem added a mystical element to the discussion.
meanings.sent3: The anagogic twist in the movie made the audience ponder its hidden message.
meanings.sent4: His anagogic artwork spoke to the soul in a way that words could not.
meanings.sent5: The anagogic symbolism in the painting left a lasting impression on viewers.

meanings.definition: Serving as a spiritual or mystical interpretation.
meanings.sent1: The anagogic symbols in the dream hinted at a deeper spiritual truth.
meanings.sent2: The anagogic nature of the ritual brought a sense of mysticism to the ceremony.
meanings.sent3: Her anagogic explanation of the phenomenon made everyone smile in wonder.
meanings.sent4: The anagogic aura surrounding the ancient ruins gave them an otherworldly feel.
meanings.sent5: The anagogic music seemed to transport listeners to a higher realm of existence.
